snippet.title: Mutant Herd - Vic 20 - Cartridge - Real Hardware
snippet.description:
Quite an interesting one.  It's made up of two parts.  The first is where you protect your base in the middle of the screen.  You can push the mutants away with the lines either off the screen, or into the hives that the queen ants live in.
When a purple mutant appears and the sound changes, you need to push it into a hive which will take you to the second part.
Once in the hive, you have to go down to the lower level and plant the dynamite, then push the plunger at the top to detonate it.
After you have destroyed the eggs, that hive is gone and you have to do the same to the next one, but now the lines you move have gaps in them.  After each one more gaps appear and the hives get harder.
The last hive is won when you detonate the dynamite when the mutant ant queen is next to it, then it starts again.
